title: Non-arual set, Come Away - six-four chord type

content.question: The chord in box A is

choices.label: The figure presents the first option, option A of question number 71. The option is an arpeggiated second inversion chord.
The figure presents the second option, option B of question number 71. The option is a neighbouring (pedal) second inversion chord.
The figure presents the third option, option C of question number 71. The option is a cadential second inversion chord.
The figure presents the fourth option, option D of question number 71. The option is a passing second inversion chord.

content.answer: The figure presents the fourth option, option D of question number 71. The option is a passing second inversion chord.
